roleset.name: to grant a benefit enjoyed by few

example.name: Money
example.text: As for his finances, I was never privileged ** to know exactly how much Letch had "salted away".
example.arg: ** to know exactly how much Letch had "salted away".

roleset.note: PRIVILEGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'privilege' based on Brown ULA. No Verbnet entry. frame by Perryn (from privilege.01-v predicate notes)
